title: India's WTC Final Loss: Rohit Sharma's Disappointment & Call for Longer Championship
content:
India's captain, Rohit Sharma, expressed his disappointment after the team's loss to Australia in the World Test Championship final. The team fell short of the target, losing by 209 runs.  

Sharma pointed out the team's lack of execution and the crucial first-innings deficit. He also stressed the need for a longer format for the WTC final, suggesting a best-of-three series to give both teams a fairer chance. 

While acknowledging the congested international calendar, Sharma believes a longer final would allow teams to build momentum and showcase their true potential in the pinnacle of Test cricket.
